utterance: I don't believe for a second that immigrants can make good doctors and nurses. They're all rapists and murderers!

utterance: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is not a problem?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.

Just look at this picture I took in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
